sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import "./Product.css" import StarRating from '../Components/StarRating'; import PrimaryNav from '../Components/PrimaryNav'; import Main from '../Components/Main'; function Product(props) { let HomeProductData = props.HomeProducts let location = useLocation() let Asset = location.state // let n = Asset.rate useEffect(() => { let emiResult = calemi(Asset.price); const currentDate = new Date(); console.log(currentDate); // console.log(Asset, "Assets") console.log(emiResult, "EMI calculation result"); }, [Asset.price]); function calemi(emicost) { let cleanedCost = parseFloat(Asset.price.replace(/,/g, '')); return (cleanedCost / 12).toFixed(2); } function formatDate(date) { const days = ['Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday']; const months = ['January', 'February', 'March', 'April', 'May', 'June', 'July', 'August', 'September', 'October', 'November', 'December']; const dayName = days[date.getDay()]; const day = date.getDate(); const month = months[date.getMonth()]; return `${dayName}, ${day} ${month}`; } const currentDate = new Date(); console.log("Current Date: ", formatDate(currentDate)); function addDays(date, days) { const result = new Date(date); result.setDate(result.getDate() + days); return result; } const dateIn3Days = addDays(currentDate, 3); console.log("Date after 3 days: ", formatDate(dateIn3Days)); return ( // <>

{Asset.description}

({Asset.rate})

Visit {Asset.brand} now!!

₹ {Asset.price}/-

{Asset.discount} %

₹ {Asset.compare}

No Cost EMI

Upto ₹ {calemi(Asset.price)}

EMI Available

Bank Discounts

Get upto ₹1000 discount

using Credit Card

Coupon Code

Get coupon for next purchase

upto ₹ 500 cashback

Order Details

Product Name: {Asset.productName}

Category: {Asset.category}

Sub-Category: {Asset.subCategory}

Free Delivery

Shipped by Nimbus

Your product will be delivered by {formatDate(dateIn3Days)}

Seller: {Asset.brand}

Partner: Shopin

Shipping: Nimbus

Cost: ₹ {Asset.compare} (-{Asset.discount}%)

Price: ₹ {Asset.price}/-

Delivery Cost: ₹ 0

Net Amount: ₹ {Asset.price}/-

) } export default Product
